News

  • Peace
    Carlson reported that an interview with Putin would be posted on 9 February at 0200 Moscow.
    04:16
    American journalist Tucker Carlson reported that an interview with the Russian President, Vladimir Putin, would be made at 0200 on 9 February.
  • Peace
    MIND: Russia is alarmed by the risks of military confrontation on the Korean peninsula
    04:05
    The Russian side is alarmed by the risk of military confrontation on the Korean peninsula.
  • Peace
    Kirby said that there was no need to interview Putin Carlson.
    03:49
    The Coordinator for Strategic Communications in the U.S. National Security Council, John Kirby, questioned the need to interview Russian President Vladimir Putin as American journalist Taker Karlson.
  • Peace
    Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs: No membership in EEA is acceptable to Armenia
    03:36
    The head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia, Alexander Pankin, stated in the interview of RIA Novosti, that renunciation of membership in the Eurasian Economic Union would not be acceptable to Armenia.
  • Peace
    Ambassador to France, Meshkov: the supply of arms to the conflict zone is a red line
    03:26
    The Ambassador of Russia to Paris, Alexei Meshkov, stated that any transfer of arms to the conflict zone was considered by Moscow as a red line.
  • Peace
    In Japan, Smoke was recorded at the Zuruga NPP
    03:16
    The first energy unit of the Curuga plant in Japan recorded smoke.
  • Former USSR
    " KP " : the Mosesev tanker held the attack on 24 hours and prevented the enemy from moving forward
    03:12
    The Tankist of the Russian Federation, Nikolai Mosesev, held the attacks on 24 hours by the UPU and prevented the enemy from breaking into the position of Russian troops.
  • Peace
    Bloomberg: In the event of victory in the elections, Trump will take trade measures against the EU
    03:07
    The candidate for the President of the United States, the ex-Chief of the State Donald Trump, will introduce " merciful " trade measures against the EU if he wins the forthcoming elections.
  • Peace
    In the USA, an investigation into the Baden Storage of Secret Documents case was completed
    02:55
    Special Prosecutor Robert Hur completed an investigation into the mistreatment of President Joe Byden of secret documents by the U.S. President.
  • Russia
    Two new vehicle number codes will appear in the Underwater.
    02:47
    Two new vehicle number codes will appear in Moscow region, 250 and 550.
  • Russia
    Telegraph: Friedman won a court with an unpaid housekeeper
    02:27
    The Russian businessman, Michael Friedman, won a trial by his housekeeper, Dominic Kozlik, who he couldn't pay because of the sanctions imposed on him.
  • Peace
    Congressman Clyde: Ukraine ' s assistance on the bill is greater than the US Marine Budget.
    02:20
    Andrew Clyde, a member of the House of Representatives of the United States Republic Party, said that Ukraine ' s $60 billion assistance under the new bill was greater than that of the U.S. Marine Corps.
  • Peace
    Businessman Sachs laughed at Byden, wearing a tie in the colours of the flag of Ukraine.
    02:11
    The American businessman and investor, David Sachs, made fun of the President of the United States of America, Joe Byden, because he showed up in front of the press in a box of Ukrainian flag color and a Ukrainian badge to support Kiev.
  • Former USSR
    NIC: Nicolaev has been bombed by an explosion
    02:07
    The explosion took place in Nikolaev in Ukraine.
  • Peace
    The Estonian authorities banned the March Klava Koki Pevic concert in Tallinn
    02:04
    In Estonia, the Klava Koki Pevic concert, scheduled for 29 March in Tallin, was banned.

info.title: Carlson reported that an interview with Putin would be posted on 9 February at 0200 Moscow.
info.short_text: American journalist Tucker Carlson reported that an interview with the Russian President, Vladimir Putin, would be made at 0200 on 9 February.

info.title: MIND: Russia is alarmed by the risks of military confrontation on the Korean peninsula
info.short_text: The Russian side is alarmed by the risk of military confrontation on the Korean peninsula.

info.title: Kirby said that there was no need to interview Putin Carlson.
info.short_text: The Coordinator for Strategic Communications in the U.S. National Security Council, John Kirby, questioned the need to interview Russian President Vladimir Putin as American journalist Taker Karlson.

info.short_text: The head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia, Alexander Pankin, stated in the interview of RIA Novosti, that renunciation of membership in the Eurasian Economic Union would not be acceptable to Armenia.

info.short_text: The Ambassador of Russia to Paris, Alexei Meshkov, stated that any transfer of arms to the conflict zone was considered by Moscow as a red line.

info.short_text: The Tankist of the Russian Federation, Nikolai Mosesev, held the attacks on 24 hours by the UPU and prevented the enemy from breaking into the position of Russian troops.

info.short_text: The candidate for the President of the United States, the ex-Chief of the State Donald Trump, will introduce " merciful " trade measures against the EU if he wins the forthcoming elections.

info.short_text: Two new vehicle number codes will appear in Moscow region, 250 and 550.

info.short_text: Andrew Clyde, a member of the House of Representatives of the United States Republic Party, said that Ukraine ' s $60 billion assistance under the new bill was greater than that of the U.S. Marine Corps.

info.short_text: The American businessman and investor, David Sachs, made fun of the President of the United States of America, Joe Byden, because he showed up in front of the press in a box of Ukrainian flag color and a Ukrainian badge to support Kiev.
